ADY TO LIGHT OUR DARKEST HOUR!"

Even as Tuscon finished speaking the door =
from the interior of the Ark
opened as Lord Elder came through.

e needed.=94

of all of
us maybe needed.=94

As the voices spoke, there was a click, then=

Prime=92s chest plate split down the middle and then s=
lowly opened. From
inside a light blazed out, and the sphere that was the m=
atrix rose up

ntire

The mat=
rix positioned itself above the fallen leader of the Autobots

ng the room for a moment. Then it oriented on Tuscon.

nhancing him, filling him with the energy and wisdom

=93We have given you the embers Tuscon, and its power has changed you.
Ho=
wever to light our darkest hour you must ignite the flames of that

ve gone out.=94

With those words the ball dimmed as it slowly dropped into=

OOC: Tuscon Prime has arrived!!!!!!
